abstract: Miami-Dade Circuit Court Judge Sarah Zabel lifts temporary ban on same-sex marriage, as county becomes first in Florida to allow gay couples to wed.
lead_paragraph: Miami-Dade became the first county in Florida to allow gay couples to wed after a state judge lifted a temporary ban.

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro contributed reporting from New York.

snippet: Miami-Dade became the first county in Florida to allow gay couples to wed after a state judge lifted a temporary ban.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Judge Lifts Ban, and Gay Weddings Begin in Florida
headline.print_headline: Judge Lifts Ban, and Gay Weddings Begin in Florida
